list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Update calculator interface and scripts
Added SVG.js for graphical representation and sleeked the interface of the position calculator by improving the HTML structure and styling. The input fields are revised to include step and minimum limitations, and a form is introduced for better data handling. The calculation formula has been adjusted to add more accuracy in calculating the distance. Furthermore, event listeners are updated to handle and prevent validation on form submission rather than key press. These changes are implemented to enhance the user experience and improve the accuracy and presentation of the calculator. The workspace.xml file records these changes.

task.summary:
Add HTML structure and script for position calculator
This commit adds an HTML file which includes a basic structure for a position calculator. Elements for taking inputs and rendering the calculated result are added. There are labels and input fields for parameters like array span, ground to array bottom, audience head height, and audience width. The JavaScript in the file adds functionality to listen for key press events and prevent non-numeric values. Also, the logic for the actual position calculation is implemented in the calculate function.
Also, made changes to the .idea/workspace.xml file to reflect the changes made in the project, including the addition of the new HTML File.

Update calculator interface and scripts

Furthermore, event listeners are updated to handle and prevent validation on form submission rather than key press. These changes are implemented to enhance the user experience and improve the accuracy and presentation of the calculator. The workspace.xml file records these changes.
